snippet: Paul James, a global brand leader for hotels chains, woke up one morning in Bangkok with an eye swollen shut. Before long, he realized he would need medical care.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Paul James, global brand leader for hotel chains, discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Paul James, a global brand leader for hotels chains, woke up one morning in Bangkok with an eye swollen shut. Before long, he realized he would need medical care.

headline.main: Really Affordable Health Care, and It Came With a Doorman, Too
headline.print_headline: Really Affordable Health Care, and It Came With a Doorman, Too
